content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, although our fictional character background doesn't allow for such introductions, let's proceed with discussing the rental price for the apartment in Magdeburg. I hope to find an attractive offer for myself.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I am willing to offer you the apartment for 750 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I regret to say, but I don't want to continue the negotiation at this price range, because the potential return on investment is insufficient for me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 720 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While I appreciate your effort, I still don't want to continue the negotiation at this price point as it falls short of my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to go as low as 700 euros. This is the lowest I can offer for this apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euro!_TERMINATE_
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
